title: rukalu padhivElunna
sahitya:
rUkalu padivElunna cEreDu nUkalu gatigAni O manasA

anupallavi

 kOkalu vEyunna gaTTu kOnuTa kokaTigAni O manasA

caraNam

 UrElina tA baNDuTa mUdumUra tAvugAni nUru bhakSaNamu 
labbina antO nOTikanta gAni Eru niNDuga pArina pAtraku tagu nIru 
vaccugAni sAra taruni harini tyAgarAja sannutuni maravakE manasA
